com.glavsoft.viewer.swing

Class ConnectionPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glavsoft.viewer.mvp.Presenter
      • com.glavsoft.viewer.swing.ConnectionPresenter

  • public class ConnectionPresenter
extends Presenter
    A Presenter (controller) that presents business logic for connection establishing interactions Before starting connection process you have to add View(s) and Model(s), and need to set @see ConnectionWorkerFactory
